member.name: M:BasicRestAPI.Controllers.CarController.GetAllCarsForGarage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets you a list of all the cars inside a garage. If the garage does not exist, you get a 404. An empty list means "no cars available".
member.param: The unique identifier of the garage

member.name: M:BasicRestAPI.Controllers.CarController.AddCarToGarage(System.Int32,BasicRestAPI.Model.Web.CarUpsertInput)
member.summary: Creates a new car inside a garage. A 404 means that the garage with said id does not exist.
member.param: The unique identifier of the garage

member.name: P:BasicRestAPI.Model.Web.CarWebOutput.Id
member.summary: This is an identifier that is guaranteed to be unique within the context of a single instance of our API,
